title: Life is Expensive! Save $500 Off Move In Costs On Our One Bedroom!
posting_body: ['3815 North Pearl Street, Tacoma, WA 98407', 'Northpoint Apartments in Tacoma offers the ultimate convenience when it comes to location.', 'Our community is conveniently located near the Procter\xa0District and Point Ruston and just one mile south of Point Defiance Zoo.', 'There are a variety of entertainment, shopping, schools, scenic views (bask in the beauty of Mt. Rainier and\xa0Commencement Bay), leisurely hikes through\xa0Point\xa0Defiance\xa0Park,\xa0and more nearby!', 'Visit us online to schedule your tour today.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Vaulted Ceilings', 'Private Patio/Balcony', 'Wood Burning Fireplace', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'New Wood-Like Vinyl Flooring', 'Quartz Countertops', 'Community Features:', 'Playground', 'Business Center', 'Translation Service Available', 'Pet Spa', 'Carport Parking', 'Clubhouse', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
